mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, m.age, m.gender, m.self_intro, m.address, m.fav_sport, m.profile_image FROM mypage AS m LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON m.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, m.age, m.gender, m.self_intro, m.address, m.fav_sport, m.profile_image FROM mypage AS m LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, m.age, m.gender, m.self_intro, m.address, m.fav_sport, m.profile_image, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow f WHERE f.user_from_id = #{user_id} AND f.user_to_id=u.user_id) AS user_follow_cnt FROM mypage AS m LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.user_id != #{user_id};
